name: Space Paint (Adam O.)
description:
This is just a simple twist on painting. Instead of normal painting, you have a ship that has space effects that can make paint. Donating will encourage me to make more features like changeable paint, more ships, and more suggested ideas. This was made while I was making a Asteroids game in Gamemaker 1.4. If you want to make sure this is not a virus you can click here or you can scan it with your antivirus. There is only one service that says it is malware and that is a fluke. If you want to make your own remix of Space Paint click here.

Space Paint by Adam Ostrinsky is licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0
